definition: annoyed and irritable, in genetics, the act of mixing different species or varieties of animals or plants and thus to produce hybrids, to breed animals or plants using parents of different races and varieties
details:
adjective
- annoyed and irritable
= synonyms: fussy
- extending or lying across
= synonyms: transverse, transversal, thwartwise
noun
- in genetics, the act of mixing different species or varieties of animals or plants and thus to produce hybrids
= example: in genetics, the act of mixing different species or varieties of animals or plants and thus to produce hybrids
= synonyms: crossing
- (genetics) an organism that is the offspring of genetically dissimilar parents or stock
= synonyms: crossbreed
- a wooden structure consisting of an upright post with a transverse piece
- a marking that consists of lines that cross each other
= synonyms: mark
- any affliction that causes great suffering
= example: any affliction that causes great suffering
= synonyms: crown of thorns
verb
- to breed animals or plants using parents of different races and varieties
= example: to breed animals or plants using parents of different races and varieties
= synonyms: crossbreed
- to trace a line through or across
= example: to trace a line through or across
- to travel across or pass over
= synonyms: traverse
- to meet and pass
= example: to meet and pass
- to fold so as to resemble a cross
= example: to fold so as to resemble a cross
- to meet at a point
= synonyms: intersect
- to hinder or prevent the efforts, plans, or desires of
= synonyms: spoil
